● A dedicated Venue Manager/Site Coordinator. ● Access to stunning gardens, the historic home, or pavilion/patio. ● Tables and chairs for your guests. ● Delicious food and beverages from one of our curated menus. Served Buffet Style. ● Professional bartender and food servers. #### **Menu Options**
**Brunch & Bubbles**
A perfect menu for a late morning or early afternoon ceremonies.
